sentences.en: And you believe that this phantom will attack that conference?
sentences.cn: 你认为幽灵会去攻击这次的会议?
曙光终于驱散了夜间所有的魍魉鬼怪.

sentences.en: He is only a phantom of a king.
sentences.cn: 他只是有名无实的国王.

sentences.en: How terrible it was to think that conscience could raise such fearful phantom.
sentences.cn: 想到良心竟会唤醒如此可怕的幽灵,真是吓人.

sentences.en: I don't mean that he had traded on his phantom millions.
sentences.cn: 我不是说他利用了他那虚幻的百万家财.

sentences.en: Indeed, pain itself is an illusion, a phantom in the brain.
sentences.cn: 实际上疼痛本身就是一个幻觉，一个脑中的幽灵。

sentences.en: Phantom horsemen rode by in the night.
sentences.cn: 幽灵似的骑马人在夜间催马而过.

sentences.en: Ruggum, his eyes riveted upon the phantom , recoiled mechanically to the western wall.
sentences.cn: 拉根一边用眼睛盯着那个鬼影, 一边机械地向西墙边退去.

sentences.en: She was a phantom of delight.
She was always taking days off for what her colleagues considered phantom illnesses.
sentences.cn: 她老请病假，同事们认为她所说的病纯属无中生有。

sentences.en: The castle is said to be haunted by a phantom.
sentences.cn: 据说那座城堡时常闹鬼.

sentences.en: The depth in phantom or body may be comparable to the range of the electrons.
sentences.cn: 在模型或人体中的深度可以和电子的射程相比较.

sentences.en: The phantom cake - eater has been here again!
sentences.cn: 那神出鬼没的偷吃蛋糕的人又来过这儿了!

sentences.en: The phantom of the merry-go-round is just a local superstition.
sentences.cn: 旋转木马的幽灵只不过是当地的迷信说法。

sentences.en: The phantom used to appear unexpectedly, but mostly during the winter.
sentences.cn: 那个幽灵过去常常出人意料地出现，但是大多在冬季。

sentences.en: The Phantom was catapulted from the carrier.
sentences.cn: 这架鬼怪式飞机从航空母舰弹射起飞.

sentences.en: They vanished down the stairs like two phantoms.
sentences.cn: 他们像两个幽灵似的下楼不见了。

words.tran_cn: 幻影似的；变幻不定的；幻想的；幽灵的
幽灵的；[心理]幻觉的；有名无实的

trans.tran_cn: 幽灵似的，幻影的，虚幻的，虚构的
幻影，幽灵，错觉，恐惧的事物
trans.tran_en: something that exists only in your imagination
